name: dark-ambient-journey
pattern:
// Dark Ambient Journey - 96 cycle longform composition
// Structure: Intro (16) -> Build (16) -> Main (32) -> Breakdown (16) -> Outro (16)
setcpm(60)

// Section timing using .when() for structural control
const intro = (p) => p.when("<1@16 0@80>", x => x)
const build = (p) => p.when("<0@16 1@16 0@64>", x => x)
const main = (p) => p.when("<0@32 1@32 0@32>", x => x)
const breakdown = (p) => p.when("<0@64 1@16 0@16>", x => x)
const outro = (p) => p.when("<0@80 1@16>", x => x)
const fromBuild = (p) => p.when("<0@16 1@80>", x => x)
const fromMain = (p) => p.when("<0@32 1@64>", x => x)
const tillBreakdown = (p) => p.when("<1@64 0@32>", x => x)
const fullTrack = (p) => p

stack(
  // === LAYER 1: Evolving Pad Chords ===
  // Present throughout, evolves with .every()
  note("<[c2,eb2,g2,bb2] [ab1,c2,eb2,g2] [f1,ab1,c2,eb2] [db1,f1,ab1,c2]>")
    .s("sawtooth")
    .attack(4)
    .decay(2)
    .sustain(0.6)
    .release(8)
    .cutoff(sine.range(200, 800).slow(32))
    .resonance(0.3)
    .every(4, x => x.add(note("12")))
    .every(8, x => x.cutoff(sine.range(400, 1200).slow(16)))
    .every(16, x => x.add(note("7")).gain(0.7))
    .room(0.95)
    .roomsize(0.9)
    .delay(0.4)
    .delaytime(0.375)
    .delayfeedback(0.6)
    .gain(sine.range(0.3, 0.5).slow(48))
    .slow(4),

  // === LAYER 2: Sub Bass Drone ===
  // Enters at build section
  note("<c1 ab0 f0 db0>")
    .s("sine")
    .attack(8)
    .decay(4)
    .sustain(0.8)
    .release(12)
    .gain(sine.range(0.4, 0.6).slow(64))
    .lpf(80)
    .slow(8)
    .apply(fromBuild),

  // === LAYER 3: Subtle Percussion - Filtered Noise ===
  // Enters at build, sparse rhythm
  s("~ ~ hh:8 ~, ~ ~ ~ hh:3")
    .lpf(sine.range(2000, 6000).slow(16))
    .hpf(1000)
    .room(0.8)
    .delay(0.3)
    .delaytime(0.25)
    .delayfeedback(0.5)
    .gain(0.15)
    .apply(fromBuild)
    .apply(tillBreakdown),

  // === LAYER 4: Metallic Clicks ===
  // Main section only
  s("~ metal:3 ~ ~, ~ ~ metal:7 ~")
    .speed(rand.range(0.5, 2))
    .hpf(2000)
    .room(0.9)
    .delay(0.5)
    .delaytime("<0.166 0.25 0.333 0.125>")
    .delayfeedback(0.7)
    .gain(0.08)
    .apply(main),

  // === LAYER 5: Melodic Fragments ===
  // Sparse, delayed, enters at main
  note("<~ eb4 ~ g4 ~ bb4 ~ c5, ~ ~ ab4 ~ ~ ~ f4 ~>")
    .s("triangle")
    .attack(0.5)
    .decay(1)
    .sustain(0.3)
    .release(4)
    .cutoff(2000)
    .room(0.95)
    .roomsize(0.95)
    .delay(0.6)
    .delaytime(0.5)
    .delayfeedback(0.75)
    .gain(0.25)
    .slow(2)
    .apply(fromMain),

  // === LAYER 6: High Frequency Texture ===
  // Shimmering overtones, main section
  note("<c6 ~ eb6 ~ g6 ~ bb6 ~>")
    .s("sine")
    .attack(2)
    .release(6)
    .room(0.99)
    .delay(0.7)
    .delaytime(0.666)
    .delayfeedback(0.8)
    .gain(0.06)
    .slow(4)
    .apply(main),

  // === LAYER 7: Deep Rumble ===
  // Low frequency movement, build and main
  n("<0 ~ 2 ~ 4 ~ 2 ~>")
    .scale("c1:minor")
    .s("sine")
    .attack(4)
    .release(8)
    .lpf(60)
    .gain(0.35)
    .slow(8)
    .apply(fromBuild)
    .apply(tillBreakdown),

  // === LAYER 8: Outro Reverb Swell ===
  // Final section fade
  note("[c2,eb2,g2,bb2]")
    .s("sawtooth")
    .attack(12)
    .decay(4)
    .sustain(0.4)
    .release(16)
    .cutoff(400)
    .room(0.99)
    .roomsize(0.99)
    .gain(sine.range(0.3, 0).slow(16))
    .slow(16)
    .apply(outro)
).gain(0.75)
description: 96-cycle dark ambient journey with five distinct sections: sparse intro, building tension, full textural main section, stripped breakdown, and fading outro. Uses evolving pad chords, sub-bass drones, filtered percussion, melodic fragments with heavy delay/reverb, and structural .when() patterns for section control.

structure.build: 16-32 cycles: Add sub-bass drone, subtle percussion
structure.main: 32-64 cycles: Full texture with melody fragments, metallic clicks, high textures
structure.breakdown: 64-80 cycles: Strip back to pads and bass
